"Subdue the Fleeing $(0)":
"Pursue the $(0) flight and and defeat $(1) of them!
You will fail if $(2) or more get away."
"Pursue the $(0) flight and and defeat $(1) of them!"

"逃走$(0)を$(1)体倒せ！
$(2)体以上、逃がすと失敗。"

"A large $(0) outbreak has been
detected. These are rare specimens, so we'd
like to gather data on them before they flee."

"$(0)! We have a request
to gather data on them within a set time limit!
Your help would be most appreciated!"

"/face2 Data on the $(0) has been
gathered. Thank you for your efforts."

"The $(0) readings have disappeared.
But just encountering them provides some amount of data. Thank you for your cooperation."

"$(0)の大規模な
発生が確認されました。稀少個体につき
逃走前のデータ収集を願います。"

"$(0)です！
制限時間つきのデータ収集要請あり！
お願いします！"

"/face2 $(0)の
データ取得を完了。尽力に感謝します。"

"$(0)、ロスト。
遭遇だけでも貴重なデータです。
協力、有り難うございました。"
